snippet.title: Street Fighter 6 Years 1-2 Fighters Edition - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a look at Street Fighter 6, and some brand new amiibo figures and amiibo cards, available on Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5, 2025. Local Wireless Match supports 1v1 matches with legendary fighters whereas Avatar Match features avatars leveled up in World Tour. There are also some brand new modes that utilise the new Joy Con 2, including Gyro Battle and Calorie Contest.  

#StreetFighter6 #Nintendo
